original_text: Why did you not obey the Lord? Why did you pounce on the plunder and do evil in the eyes of the Lord?”
korean_text: 어찌하여 왕이 여호와의 목소리를 청종하지 아니하고 탈취하기에만 급하여 여호와께서 악하게 여기시는 일을 행하였나이까

sentences.original_text: Why did you not obey the Lord?
Why did you pounce on the plunder
and do evil in the eyes of the Lord?
